data.description:
Exclusive to users that don’t like complications - PLAY'A is the versatile virtual reality video player created to match a busy lifestyle.  Whether its a simple and intuitive interface, a very hip contemporary design, playback from local file storage or streaming from the network connected servers, PLAY’A does it right and it does it with style! 

Navigation is easy in and out of VR. Just jump on a couch and turn it on - you are ready to go!

At their fingertips, the users like you will find:
- 2D, 3D, flat, fisheye, 180° and 360° Videos automatically recognized
- Picture viewer with slideshow
- 8K video support (Oculus Quest 2)
- Most video formats supported
- Intuitive user interface
- Shake smoothing
- Privacy modes
- Convenient folder navigation
- Picture adjustments: brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpen, tint, temperature
- VR Video adjustments: tilt, height, zoom, playback speed

Just download and see it for yourself ! ;)

changelog.change_log:
Fixed:
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Added:
- A new download manager.
- Implemented support for simultaneous downloading of 10 videos.
- Display of available storage space in the download manager.
- The ability to create folders for websites in the Home menu.
- The option to set a password for website folders.
- Improved the UI of the tabs for websites.
- The ability to change the order of added websites in the Home menu using drag-and-drop.
Reworked: 
- Removed the Panic mode feature.
- Redesigned the pagination panel.
- Updated the WebView window.
- Disabled the ability to download videos directly from the Play'a website.
- Moved the information panel displaying time, WiFi, and battery status.
Fixed:
- A bug where quality changed incorrectly when switching projection in the web player.
- A bug with the pagination panel.
- General bug fixes and minor performance improvements.
- Minor UI/UX improvements.

Added:
- Picture adjustments for image viewer
- Possibility to change projections settings in the web player
Fixed:
- Problem with flat videos in the web mode
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Added:
- Input field in the virtual keyboard
Changed:
- Splash screen logo
- Default deadzone setting value
Fixed:
- Some problems in Network tab with SMB devices
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Fixed:
- Reverted adding additional sites
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Added:
- New Default websites
- Some Ad banners
Fixed:
- Some minor fixes and improvements
- AutoResize webview pages depending on the size of the window

Changed:
- UI logic for settings in the player
Fixed:
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Fixed:
- Some minor fixes and improvements

Added:
- VSync setting
- FPS Limits setting
- Fisheye projection for pictures

Fixed:
- Video buffering progress bar 
- Improved passthrough videos
- Some UI problems with disappearing added SMB devices

Added:

Added:

Fixed:
